dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.catalog.Catalog
dataStructure.description:
A catalog can be defined as a collation of items and arranging them in a particular manner based on the need. In the information framework point, it is as collection of entities. This entity is proposed as an abstract entity. This is to have sub classes derived out of this entity to synch up with the real world examples of product catalog, service catalog etc. The catalog presentation can be in book form or web form.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: Catalog

child.name: iD
child.description:
A unique identifier for a catalog.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: iD

child.name: type
child.description:
A categorization of an entry in the catalog such as web or book.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: type

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time during which the catalog is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: validFor

child.name: name
child.description:
A word or phrase by which a catalog is known and distinguished from other catalogs.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: name

child.name: catalogSpecification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association CatalogSpecDescribes

This association end is optional
child.label: catalogSpecification

child.name: characteristicValue
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association CharacteristicValueDescribes

This association end is optional
child.label: characteristicValue
